## ConfigurationSpec.onExit() method

Callback called when the proxy is programmatically closed (which can be done by using the callback returned from [runFromAPI()](./kassette.runfromapi.md)<!-- -->)

**Signature:**

```typescript
onExit?(): void;
```
**Returns:**

void
